Actions.Name: Hunter Shot
Actions.Effects: Bloodied characters are shoved 1 in a direction of the [name]'s choice and dazed.

Actions.Name: Set Trap
Actions.Description: The [name] creates a trap dangerous terrain space in free space in range 2.

Actions.Name: Hunt
Actions.Description: A character in range is marked. The [name] deals bonus damage to the marked character and their abilities gain unerring against them.
